sourceDesc.p: Source is a handwritten draft (pencil on college‐ruled notebook paper).

editorialDecl.p: Quotes are marked up using TEI; no attempt to mark up names has been made, as they received no special treatment in the source.
Mistakes are preserved as written. Additions are noted with the add element and strikeouts with del. Source has a number of illegible erasures which were then written over; these are not recorded.
Source contains sketches in the margin; these are encoded with graphics in figures.

revisionDesc.change: Initial version, based on original handwritten source.
